TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Port extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem

Docs.summary: Defines an individual endpoint contained in the XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class specifies a single address (URI) for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>, which defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a given <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A> property gets or sets those values for a specified `Port`.
This class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<port>` element, which is enclosed by the `<service>` element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl.
## Examples The following examples creates a Port and adds it to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service.Ports%2A> collection of an existing <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> named `myDescription`.
[!code-cpp[PortClass#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_22_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[PortClass#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_22_1.vb)] [!code-cs[PortClass#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_22_1.cs)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks A binding defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>. This property gets or sets those values for a specific `Port`.
## Examples [!code-cpp[PortClass#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.de_44_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[PortClass#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.de_44_1.vb)] [!code-cs[PortClass#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_44_1.cs)]
